Title: AjaxControlToolkit additional extenders
Description: AjaxControlToolkit based additionals extenders.  Now it contains BreadCrumbsExtender and UpdatePanelExtender for long opertions using Comet. It's developed in asp.net 2.0.
HomeWiki:
This project has started for an experementations with AjaxControlToolkit.

Source code contains some additional extention controls for a standart controls library.

Now it contains the following extenders:
  • - BreadCrumbsExtender for hierarchical data (it not almost supported toolkit and requared the jQuery)
  • - UpdatePanelExtender for long executing operations (implementing the state design pattern on an ASP)
The documentation will be updated soon.

Please, feedback your opinions about those extenders.


Project Description
AjaxControlToolkit based additionals extenders. Now it contains BreadCrumbsExtender and UpdatePanelExtender for long opertions using Comet. It's developed in asp.net 2.0.
